# Introduction

Hi there! Thanks for visiting my portfolio. I’m a data scientist with over four years of experience, currently serving as a Senior Data Scientist at [Tiger Analytics](https://www.tigeranalytics.com/) in Bangalore, India.

Thanks for stopping by! I hope you enjoy discovering more about my work.
